# This file was generated, DO NOT edit, you WILL lose the stuff here if someone triggers generation again.

balanced_direct = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 15

    trigger = {
        phase = skirmish
        days >= 1
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = 0.1
    light_infantry_defensive = -0.2
    heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.1
    heavy_infantry_defensive = -0.1
    pikemen_offensive = 0.1
    pikemen_defensive = -0.1
    light_cavalry_offensive = 0.1
    light_cavalry_defensive = -0.1
    knights_offensive = 0.1
    knights_defensive = -0.1
    archers_offensive = 0.1
    archers_defensive = 0.0

}

balanced_direct_bad = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 15

    trigger = {
        phase = skirmish
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial <= 7
            NOT = { trait = pursuit_specialist }
            NOT = { trait = unyielding_leader }
            NOT = { trait = omnicidal_maniac }
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
                martial <= 7
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = long_range_combat_specialist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = desert_terrain_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = trickster
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = organizer
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = defensive_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                religion = neo_feudal
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                religion = neo_feudal
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                trait = short_range_specialist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                trait = orbital_combat_specialist
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = -0.3
    light_infantry_defensive = -0.5
    heavy_infantry_offensive = -0.3
    heavy_infantry_defensive = -0.4
    pikemen_offensive = -0.3
    pikemen_defensive = -0.5
    light_cavalry_offensive = -0.3
    light_cavalry_defensive = -0.4
    knights_offensive = -0.3
    knights_defensive = -0.4
    archers_offensive = -0.3
    archers_defensive = -0.4

}

balanced_direct_good = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 15

    trigger = {
        phase = skirmish
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial >= 16
            NOT = { trait = pursuit_specialist }
            NOT = { trait = unyielding_leader }
            NOT = { trait = omnicidal_maniac }
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
                martial >= 16
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = long_range_combat_specialist

        additive_modifier = {

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30

                trait = trickster

        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = organizer
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = defensive_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                religion = neo_feudal
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                religion = neo_feudal

        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30

                trait = short_range_specialist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                trait = orbital_combat_specialist
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = 0.5
    light_infantry_defensive = 0.2
    heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.5
    heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.3
    pikemen_offensive = 0.5
    pikemen_defensive = 0.2

laser_direct = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 15

    trigger = {
        phase = skirmish
        days >= 1
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = -1.0
    light_infantry_defensive = -0.2
    heavy_infantry_offensive = 1.2
    heavy_infantry_defensive = -0.3
    pikemen_offensive = -1.0
    pikemen_defensive = -0.2
    light_cavalry_offensive = -0.1
    light_cavalry_defensive = -0.2
    knights_offensive = 0.5
    knights_defensive = -0.2

    archers_defensive = 0.0

}

    days = 15

    trigger = {

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

    sprite = 1
    days = 25

    trigger = {
        phase = skirmish
        days >= 1
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = -0.1
    light_infantry_defensive = 0.9

            value = -30
            leader = {
                trait = orbital_combat_specialist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                religion = neo_feudal
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = 0.3
    light_infantry_defensive = 1.6
    heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.3
    heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.8
    pikemen_offensive = 0.3
    pikemen_defensive = 1.4
    light_cavalry_offensive = 0.3
    light_cavalry_defensive = 0.9
    knights_offensive = 0.3
    knights_defensive = 0.7
    archers_offensive = 0.3
    archers_defensive = 0.5

}

laser_weave = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 25

    trigger = {
        phase = skirmish
        days >= 1
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = -1.0
    light_infantry_defensive = 0.9
    heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.8
    heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.1
    pikemen_offensive = -1.0
    pikemen_defensive = 0.7
    light_cavalry_offensive = -0.3
    light_cavalry_defensive = 0.2
    knights_offensive = 0.3
    knights_defensive = 0.0
    archers_offensive = -1.0
    archers_defensive = 0.1

}

laser_weave_bad = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 25

    trigger = {
        phase = skirmish
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial <= 7
            NOT = { trait = pursuit_specialist }
            NOT = { trait = unyielding_leader }
            NOT = { trait = omnicidal_maniac }
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
                martial <= 7
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = long_range_combat_specialist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = desert_terrain_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = trickster
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = organizer
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = defensive_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                trait = short_range_specialist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                trait = orbital_combat_specialist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                religion = neo_feudal
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = -1.0
    light_infantry_defensive = 0.1
    heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.1
    heavy_infantry_defensive = -0.4
    pikemen_offensive = -1.0
    pikemen_defensive = 0.0
    light_cavalry_offensive = -0.6
    light_cavalry_defensive = -0.3
    knights_offensive = -0.2
    knights_defensive = -0.4
    archers_offensive = -1.0
    archers_defensive = -0.3

}

laser_weave_good = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 25

    trigger = {
        phase = skirmish
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial >= 16
            NOT = { trait = pursuit_specialist }
            NOT = { trait = unyielding_leader }
            NOT = { trait = omnicidal_maniac }
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
                martial >= 16
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = long_range_combat_specialist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = desert_terrain_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = trickster
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = organizer
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = defensive_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                trait = short_range_specialist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                trait = orbital_combat_specialist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                religion = neo_feudal
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = -1.0
    light_infantry_defensive = 1.7
    heavy_infantry_offensive = 1.5
    heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.5
    pikemen_offensive = -1.0
    pikemen_defensive = 1.4
    light_cavalry_offensive = 0.0
    light_cavalry_defensive = 0.7
    knights_offensive = 0.8
    knights_defensive = 0.5

    archers_defensive = 0.6

missile_weave = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 25

    trigger = {
        phase = skirmish
        days >= 1
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = -0.1
    light_infantry_defensive = 1.1
    heavy_infantry_offensive = -1.0
    heavy_infantry_defensive = 1.9
    pikemen_offensive = 0.8
    pikemen_defensive = 1.1
    light_cavalry_offensive = 0.0
    light_cavalry_defensive = 1.1
    knights_offensive = -0.5
    knights_defensive = 1.4
    archers_offensive = -1.0
    archers_defensive = 0.1

}

    sprite = 1
    days = 25

    trigger = {
        phase = skirmish
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial <= 7
            NOT = { trait = pursuit_specialist }
            NOT = { trait = unyielding_leader }
            NOT = { trait = omnicidal_maniac }
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
                martial <= 7
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = long_range_combat_specialist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = desert_terrain_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = trickster
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = organizer
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = defensive_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                religion = cyberneticist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                religion = machine_cultist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                religion = hiver
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                religion = neo_feudal
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                trait = short_range_specialist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                trait = orbital_combat_specialist
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = -0.5
    light_infantry_defensive = 0.3
    heavy_infantry_offensive = -1.0
    heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.7
    pikemen_offensive = 0.1
    pikemen_defensive = 0.2

    knights_offensive = -0.7
    knights_defensive = 0.4
    archers_offensive = -1.0
    archers_defensive = -0.3

}

missile_weave_good = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 25

    trigger = {
        phase = skirmish
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial >= 16
            NOT = { trait = pursuit_specialist }

            NOT = { trait = omnicidal_maniac }

        days = 100

            factor = 4

                martial >= 16

        additive_modifier = {

            leader = {
                trait = desert_terrain_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = trickster
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = organizer
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = defensive_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                religion = cyberneticist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                religion = machine_cultist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                religion = hiver
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                religion = neo_feudal
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                trait = short_range_specialist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                trait = orbital_combat_specialist
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = 0.3
    light_infantry_defensive = 2.0
    heavy_infantry_offensive = -1.0
    heavy_infantry_defensive = 3.0
    pikemen_offensive = 1.5
    pikemen_defensive = 1.9
    light_cavalry_offensive = 0.4
    light_cavalry_defensive = 1.9
    knights_offensive = -0.4
    knights_defensive = 2.3
    archers_offensive = -1.0
    archers_defensive = 0.5

}

            martial <= 7

    trigger = {

        leader = {
            martial >= 16

            }

            }
        }

    sprite = 1
    days = 20

    trigger = {
        phase = skirmish
        days >= 1
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = 0.1
    light_infantry_defensive = -0.2
    heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.1

    pikemen_offensive = 0.1

    sprite = 1
    days = 20

    trigger = {
        phase = skirmish
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial <= 7
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4

                martial <= 7
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = -0.7
    light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
    heavy_infantry_offensive = -0.7
    heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.1
    pikemen_offensive = -0.7
    pikemen_defensive = -0.1
    light_cavalry_offensive = -0.7
    light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
    knights_offensive = -0.7
    knights_defensive = 0.0
    archers_offensive = -0.7
    archers_defensive = -0.2

}

defensive_direct_retrograde_good = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 20

    trigger = {
        phase = skirmish
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial >= 16
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
                martial >= 16
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = -0.2
    light_infantry_defensive = 1.3
    heavy_infantry_offensive = -0.2
    heavy_infantry_defensive = 1.5
    pikemen_offensive = -0.2
    pikemen_defensive = 1.1
    light_cavalry_offensive = -0.2
    light_cavalry_defensive = 1.2
    knights_offensive = -0.2
    knights_defensive = 1.4
    archers_offensive = -0.2
    archers_defensive = 0.9

}

balanced_weave_retrograde = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 30

    trigger = {
        phase = skirmish
        days >= 1
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = -0.1
    light_infantry_defensive = 0.9
    heavy_infantry_offensive = -0.1
    heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.3
    pikemen_offensive = -0.1
    pikemen_defensive = 0.7

    sprite = 1
    days = 30

    trigger = {
        phase = skirmish

    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100
    }

defensive_weave_retrograde = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 30

    trigger = {
        phase = skirmish
        days >= 1
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = -0.6
    light_infantry_defensive = 2.8
    heavy_infantry_offensive = -0.6
    heavy_infantry_defensive = 1.5
    pikemen_offensive = -0.6
    pikemen_defensive = 2.2
    light_cavalry_offensive = -0.5
    light_cavalry_defensive = 1.4

    sprite = 1
    days = 30

    trigger = {
        phase = skirmish
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial >= 16
        }
    }

        days = 100

            factor = 4

                martial >= 16

    light_cavalry_defensive = 2.4
    knights_offensive = -0.4

    archers_offensive = -0.4
    archers_defensive = 1.2
